name: 萨曼莎·科尔
introduction: Samantha Liana Cole is an up and coming Toronto actress, coming from a Jamaican background. Her journey in front of the camera start- ed with modeling, which she has done for 5 years now, however, her true calling has always been acting. So two years ago she took a few acting workshops and went out in pursuit of an acting agency. Samantha began not only going to the auditions her agent had sent her out for but also projects she found on her own, including Indies, Commercials, TV shows and Student Films. She has had a very successful year in terms of exceeding her own personal goals - one being booking her very first auditionfor an Independent Short Film, since stepping onto the scene. Today Samantha has since ventured into weekly acting classes at EVN Studios, signed with a new and more reputable agency and dedicates all her days to her craft. Samantha to date has starred in dozens of Independent Films as well as Feature Films and Television Series. She is exceedingly driven and devoted to the continuing growth of her Acting career.-Every second is a waking moment to change your life for the better.
